H0.text: Which handheld electronic toy had to be treated as a pet. Tamagotchi

H1.text: Which handheld electronic toy had to be treated as a pet. Giga Pet

H2.text: Which handheld electronic toy had to be treated as a pet. Nano Pet

H3.text: Which handheld electronic toy had to be treated as a pet. Mametchi

A4.text: Tamagotchi was a brand of handheld digital pets marketed since 1996 by Japanese toymaker Bandai.

A5.text: Tiger/Hasbro's Giga Pet was a knock-off product or imitator at the time.
